alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:19PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sussex, southern Kent, northeastern Talbot, central Queen Anne`s and northern Caroline Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1018 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Centerville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Milford, Denton, Centreville, Harrington, Camden, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Bowers, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Woodside, Viola, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Starr, Jumptown, Sandtown, Rising Sun and Wye Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
